Martini 3 polymer topologies can be obtained using [`PolyPly`](https://github.com/marrink-lab/polyply_1.0). A helpful tutorial on how to use `PolyPly` to generate polymer topologies can be found [here](https://github.com/marrink-lab/polyply_1.0/wiki/Tutorial:-Martini-Polymers).
